text: The Algerian national ice hockey team (; ) is the national men's ice hockey team of Algeria. ==History== Formed in 2008, Algeria became a member of the IIHF on September 26th 2019. The national team was formed with the increasing number of Algerians who are playing ice hockey around the world. In June 2008, Algeria took part in the inaugural Arab Cup in Abu Dhabi, also involving the national teams of Kuwait, Morocco, and the host nation, the UAE. Algeria finished last, with Algerian forward, Harond Litim winning the MVP of the tournament award. ==International competitions== *2008 Arab Cup of Ice Hockey; Abu Dhabi, United Arab Emirates.
